title: [Dark Grotto, Huge Cavern]
description: A narrow, shallow channel filled with the lively burble of flowing water forms a small stream that winds its way through the tall stone spires, creating a twisted line that cuts across the center of the cavern from west to east.  The thick moss that grows along the banks of the miniature river gives off a sweet, but slightly fetid odor.  Small lizards watch you with reptilian stoicism before darting off to hide among the rocks and fungi.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, south, southwest, west, northwest
